Bend.Central Oregon Community College:
Central Oregon Community College is a community college located in Bend, Oregon. It primarily serves residents of Deschutes, Jefferson, and Crook Counties.


== Notable faculty ==
Ray Hatton - geography professor, author, and long-distance runner
Ken Ruettgers - professional football player (an instructor)


== Partner Institution ==
Central Oregon Community College has a 2+2 partnership with Oregon State University Cascades Campus offering lower-division and prerequisite coursework that can be used toward the goal of earning a bachelor's degree.
